name: udhr
description: The Universal Declaration of Human Rights (Unicode) in plain-text and JSON
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/udhr.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js build-data.js build-supported-declarations.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.scrape-data: npm run scrape-data-txt && npm run scrape-data-xml
scripts.unzip-data: npm run unzip-data-txt && npm run unzip-data-xml
scripts.prepublish: npm run scrape-data && npm run unzip-data && npm run build-data && npm run build-supported-declarations
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
